attributes.description:
Vehicle sold with Balance of the 6 Year/100 000Km Premium Drive Maintenance Plan for Peace of Mind Motoring. Finance options available with all major banks including Mercedes Benz Finance.

Reverse Camera
Active Park-Assist
LED Static Headlamps
9G Tronic
Keyless Start
Mirror Package
EASY PACK tailgate
Aluminium running boards
19inch 5 Twin Spoke Alloy

Trade ins welcome and nationwide delivery at an agreed cost. To avoid disappointment, kindly speak to one of our Certified Pre-Owned Sales Executives Kitto Msomi, Feroz Jaffar, Harold Sampson, Luyanda Mkhize, Siphamandla Mvuyana or Muhammad Adam for more info on our HOLDING DEPOSIT policy.
